mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(memberno, id, passwd, mname, tel, zipcode, address1, address2, mdate, birth, sex) VALUES (member_seq.nextval, #{id}, #{passwd}, #{mname}, #{tel}, #{zipcode}, #{address1}, #{address2}, sysdate, #{birth}, #{sex})
mapper.select: SELECT memberno, id, passwd, mname, tel, zipcode, address1, address2, mdate, grade, point, birth, sex FROM member ORDER BY grade ASC, id ASC
